title: Watch: So did SCOTUS say Texas can arrest and deport illegals or not?!
description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

Yesterday, the Supreme Court ruled that Texas could enforce a law allowing state authorities to arrest and deport illegals. Not even 24 hours after that, the ruling was blocked by a federal appeals court in the late hours of the night.

But the question remains: Does a state have a right to defend its citizens if the federal government is not doing its job?

Today‚Äôs show breaks it down.

title: Watch: Farmer uses his chickens to illustrate the globalist utopia of a 15-minute city, and it looks miserable
description:
Subscribe to Louder with Crowder on Rumble! Download the app on Apple and Google Play.

You may have heard of the concept of a 15-minute city and are wondering what one is. Here is a farmer to explain with chickens.

Before we start, the idea of a "15-minute city" tends to be fodder for conspiracy theorists. As if there is a grand cabal of global elites looking to control people by limiting them to a fifteen-minute radius and use other dystopian methods to control every aspect of their lives. Get those dark thoughts out of your head.
